item.title: The Evolution of Shiki v1.0
item.description: Shiki v1.0 came with many improvements and features - see how Nuxt drives the evolution of Shiki!

item.title: Optimizing Data Loading in Nuxt with Parallel Requests
item.description: Learn how to optimize Nuxt data loading performance by implementing parallel requests with useAsyncData, reducing page load times compared to sequential data fetching operations. Includes code examples and performance comparisons.
